resources.string:
1. Input the value into both the Cost and Tip (Tip tab) or Price and Discount (Discount tab).

 2. Press calculate or the "Done" button on the soft keyboard to get the final price.

 3. The reset button is to reset the corresponding value of tab the reset button was clicked.

 4. The 'i' button on the top left corner sets the sales tax of for the discount tab.


 Finally, but not least.. Any advise to make the app even better is always welcome! :)
